info.title: CineBook API
info.description: Cinema booking system API with comprehensive movie management, booking, and payment functionality

get.description: * Check Redis connectivity and seat locking service
* Get payment status for a booking
* Get e-ticket data for a booking

post.description: * Generate or regenerate e-ticket for a booking
* Verify e-ticket using QR code data

put.description: * Extend lock duration for user's seats
